title: Bold font with triangular A
content:
The \*thingamaging\* on the O doesn't belong to the font

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020124213/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_108.jpg) | 37.88 KB |
author: desmetadata

comments.content: ... and if the |A| doesn’t either it should be Futura.

omg.... \*facepalm\*

I was so caught on the A.. i didn't see it. You're right.. it's Futura.

thank you so much!
